task_78.description: Move the red paper cup to the center of the table, avoiding the blue tissue
task_78.initial_setup: The red cup is upright on the far left corner, 25 cm from the edge. The blue tissue is folded and lying flat on the center of the table. A green plastic cup is upright on the right side, 20 cm from the edge.
task_78.final_state: The red cup is placed directly on the center of the table, 10 cm from the edge. The blue tissue is moved to the far right corner.
